excerpt: A delicious and vegan alternative to traditional buffalo chicken pizza!

instructions.name: Make the Cauliflower Crust
instructions: In a food processor, pulse the chopped cauliflower florets until they are rice-like in texture.
Transfer the cauliflower rice to a clean kitchen towel and squeeze out as much moisture as possible.
In a large mixing bowl, mix together the cauliflower rice, almond flour, ground flaxseed, garlic powder, and water.
Mix until the ingredients form a dough-like texture.
Press the dough into a circle on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the crust is slightly browned and crispy.

instructions.name: Make the Buffalo Cauliflower Topping
instructions: In a mixing bowl, combine the chopped cauliflower florets, buffalo sauce, olive oil, garlic powder, and salt.
Mix until the cauliflower is well coated.
Spread the buffalo cauliflower mixture evenly over the prepared cauliflower crust.
Top with the vegan mozzarella cheese.
Bake for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Sprinkle with chopped green onions and cilantro before serving.
